title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Linstead,like the surgeon May, only spoke to a hearsay story,and that of Bruckley was far from being clear.

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Three of these unfortunatemen, Linstead, the supercargo's mate, Bruckley,the cooper of the Worcester, and Haines, whosegloomy hints gave the first suspicion, are said tohave uttered declarations before trial, confirmingthe truth of the charge, and admitting that thevessel so seized upon was the Rising Sun, and thatCaptain Robert Drummond and his crew were thepersons murdered in the course of that act of piracy.

title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: only spoke to a hearsay story,and that of Bruckley was far from being clear.
